original_title: Super Size Me! 12: The Big Picture
overview: Size is king – but then what’s new? – as the Super Sizers make it a round dozen! No question about it, the likes of Shane Hirch, Gabriel Angel and Xavier Sibley have always had a penchant for the bigger things in life – and they don’t come any bigger than black sex-god, Hector Agusti, whose appetite for pert, twink butt remains as undiminished as ever. Be they taking time out after a dip in the pool, or making out in the sunny outdoors, this gang of horned-up size-queens prove once again just how really big the big picture actually is!
title: Super Size Me! 12: The Big Picture
